mapper.select: SELECT E_I.EDU_ID educationId , EDU_CTGR educationCategory , EDU_TTL educationTitle , E_I.MBR_ID memberId , MAX_MBR maxMember , EDU_LOC educationLocation , EDU_CLCM educationCurriculum , EDU_INTR educationIntroduce , SRT_DATE startDate , END_DATE endDate , START_TM startTime , END_TM endTime , EDU_TP educationType , COST cost FROM EDU_INFO E_I, EDU_HTR E_H WHERE E_I.EDU_ID = E_H.EDU_ID AND E_H.MBR_ID = #{id} AND E_H.STAT = 'EDU_JN_C'
